local_intent: Prepare for grasp by confirming handle visibility, aligning to it, opening the gripper to 0.09 m, and briefly settling.
assumptions: Handle is reachable once aligned within 0.005 m tolerance.
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around the grasp phase: detect handle -> approach/align -> OpenGripper before ComputeGraspPose/Pick; uses same targets and binned parameters.
